description: Explore the transformative potential of blockchain technology in funding open source projects. This article delves into decentralized solutions like DAOs, tokenomics, and smart contracts, offering new paradigms for sustainable funding. Examine challenges, case studies, and future prospects of blockchain in open source.
keywords: Blockchain, Open Source Funding, Decentralized Finance, DAOs, Tokenomics, Smart Contracts, Gitcoin, OpenZeppelin, Giveth, Cryptocurrency, Transparency, Innovation
title: Blockchain for Open Source Funding: A New Paradigm
